summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingBYOMA's Gel-Cream Moisturizer delivers targeted hydration to thirsty skin. The light texture absorbs quickly, with a barrier boosting blend of actives.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight, oil-free daily moisturizerCooling gel-cream texture absorbs quickly, delivering lasting hydrationTri-Ceramide Complex to support skin barrier healthBrightening niacinamide + calming green tea improve tone and textureClinically proven to immediately increase hydration by 70%Clinically proven to reduce skin sensitivityClinically proven to protect and maintain the skin barrierNational Eczema Association ApprovedFeaturesDermatologist tested & approved skincareAlcohol & fragrance-freeRecyclable bottlesKey IngredientsTri-Ceramide Complex: 3 key components of the stratum corneum- ceramides, cholesterol, and fatty acids â€“ to rebuild the skin barrier and restore natural moisture levelsNiacinamide: Brighten skin + balance oiliness while improving tone + textureGreen Tea: Skin-soothing + balancing, with anti-inflammatory propertiesItem 2601332How To UseApply 1-2 pumps on cleansed skin following serum application AM + PM. Smooth onto skin until fully absorbed.IngredientsAqua, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Niacinamide, Ceramide NP, Cholesterol, Phytosphingosine, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Stearic Acid, Oleic Acid, Lactic Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Panthenol, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum, Tromethamine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Caprylhydroxamic Acid.
how_to_use: Apply 1-2 pumps on cleansed skin following serum application AM + PM. Smooth onto skin until fully absorbed.

reviews.headline: Smooth and creamy
reviews.comments: So smooth and creamy absorbs beautifully

reviews.headline: Love this on my dry, mature skin!
reviews.comments: The packaging is cute but it doesn't feel as if there's much moisturizer in there.  However, what's in there does wonders for my skin, which is dry and mature.  It drank it in and within the first day I'm seeing results that all the other "triple peptide" moisturizers I've tried didn't produce.  This is slightly sticky so I'm using it before bed, not under makeup.  This is a great moisturizer to refresh your face after you've cleaned it for the evening and need to rebuild the moisture.  It's priced right and I'm super happy I purchased it spur of the moment.

reviews.headline: I would definitely recommend this product!
reviews.comments: I've purchased this moisturizer twice now and I love it. It's a pretty good moisturizer for the price and It lasts a good amount of time. I have sensitive skin and it didn't make me breakout or cause any skin irritation! Although this product is great, I don't think I'll be purchasing it again, just because there are some other moisturizers that I like a little more. overall, I definitely recommend this product!

reviews.headline: Best moisturizer for combo skin
reviews.comments: I have combo oily skin and this is the best moisturizer I have tried. I apply it after toner and serum, and I notice that this moisturizer doesn't pill for me. It leaves my skin feeling nice and soft after drying. After using for 2+ weeks, haven't had any breakouts either

reviews.headline: It's kindaâ€¦ eh??
reviews.comments: I did like this moisturizer, but i dont think it did much for me. I didnt notice a difference in my skin after using it, had to switch out the moisturizer. This is probably the only byoma product i dont really like

reviews.headline: Above average for the price
reviews.comments: The product dispenses very nicely and the texture is what im looking for in a gel moisturizer. I hate the packaging because its super bulky and i assume this is becauae its hiding how much product is included. The smell is also kind of gross. For a summer moisturizer, its serving its purpose

reviews.headline: I love it!!
reviews.comments: Me gusto!! No deja sensaciÃ³n grasosa, si lo volveria a comprar!! Like thiss

reviews.headline: Terrible Container - Pump  Is Inadequate
reviews.comments: I had difficult getting this moistuizer to pump out of the bottle. I unscrewed the cap and discovered that the pump is extremely short. It just barely clears the inside of the cap and doesn't reach to the bottom of the bottle. This is the worst experience I've ever had and will not purchase any BYOMA products again. Wast eof money.

reviews.headline: Good, lightweight moisturizer
reviews.comments: I think this is a great, lightweight moisturizer for those who don't like heavy creams. The texture is beautiful, very lightweight, and works very well under makeup. The brand says that this product works for all skin types, but I personally think it would be better suited for people more on the oily side. For reference, I have more dry-leaning combination skin, and I really enjoyed this product as a daytime moisturizer during the summer, but found it didn't moisturize my skin enough during winter or nighttime. So if you have SUPER dry skin I probably wouldn't recommend this, but it's great for those who want a lightweight option.

reviews.headline: Gentle
reviews.comments: I have super oily skin and this helps to keep it under control my face is not super greasy by noon. I just wish there was more, it seems like I'll be running out quick

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments: I like this product is lightweight. Feels good on skin and gives that perfect hydration for the day.

reviews.headline: Good stuff!
reviews.comments: Smooth and even application. Hydrates and is cooling.

reviews.headline: â™¡LOVE LOVE LOVE AND HERES WHYYY...â™¡
reviews.comments: As someone that doesn't use skincare just because but genuinely because my skin can become crazy dry, this has worked AMAZINGLY!!! I cleanse, mist, moisturize, sunscreen, and lastly a lip balm because my CRAZY chapped lips!! I would say if I could ONLY use one thing in my routine it would be THIS! That's because it is so moisturizing on the face. It isn't to heavy (I would go for BYOMA'S rich moisturizing cream for something heavier), so when I apply my makeup, it doesn't AT ALL feel like my face is a cake full of to much skincare. If you have dry, OR sensitive skin I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: was so hopeful but :(
reviews.comments: this made me break out a lot over time. i thought it was just something else but noticed that the more i used this cream, the more i'd break out and honestly i ran out of blemish patches because of this lol so yeah i won't be buying again and will probably return it too.

reviews.headline: BETTER THAN DRUNK ELPAHANT
reviews.comments:
Girl like you read the title... 
WAYYY better than that super duper popular (and overpriced) bran Drunk Elpahant. I have a mix of oily and dry skin (ngl kinda depends on the day) and this moisturerizer works for both! It lasts a long time and is very lightweight so I don't feel like I have a very heavy product on my face. I use this with a cleanser, mist then finally this and I feel all ready to go. Also has stopped my very painful pimples on my chin. I highly recommend this product for your skin and I think it is especially good for younger skin due to how lightweight it is. Give it a try!â™¡â™¡

reviews.headline: Nice light weight moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is such a good moisturizer especially for the price. Its light weight, has no smell, and really sits well into the skin. And one pump does it for the whole face. It really keeps your skin hydrated.

reviews.headline: decent
reviews.comments: i love byoma products and i have sensitive combo skin. this moisturizer works fine but i think its a bit too light so i switched to the moisturizing rich cream instead. maybe this product works okay in the summer time but isnt best for my skin year round.

reviews.headline: Loveeee
reviews.comments: By far my favorite moisturizer, it's surprisingly very hydrating for my super dry skin despite being a gel formula!

reviews.headline: Nice formula.
reviews.comments: The green tea and niacinamide are both excellent ingredients for oil prone skin and pores. All around a good, lightweight option for oilier skin. I enjoy the way my skin feels and looks after applying.

faceoff_positive.comments:
It's the good cholesterol! Byoma is a new skincare brand with a company ethos of radical transparency and the belief without trust there is nothing. They want to educate your skin care journey on all levels including straightforward wording and explanations on their packaging which is refreshingly brilliant. Each product labels and outlines individual ingredients and specifies what their particular function addresses. Also included is the order of which the product should be used within the steps of your skincare regime. The line is non-comedogenic, vegan and free from oil, alcohol and fragrance as well as cruelty-free. They encourage a circular cycle approach to sustainability; all their packaging is fully recyclable (with the exception of droppers, mists & pumps, which can be upcycled, transferred and utilized to other items) and will soon offer a refill option. The entire line is also pocketbook friendly, nothing over 16USD. The website is creative and festive while informative and engaging. Their tagline is Boosted Barrier. Better Skin. - which I couldn't agree more.I have the privilege of being in the beauty industry for 30+ years and the opportunity to experience hundreds of cosmetic products. It takes twenty eight days to rebuild a stratum corneum (skin barrier) to a healthy protective state. All of Byoma's products are formulated to help you achieve an optimized barrier and help repair those with compromised ones. The moisturizing gel cream is a fragrance free and alcohol free lightweight formula moisturizer. It has a cooling effect when applied to the skin. It boasts a Tri-Ceramide Complex (ceramides, cholesterol, fatty acids) with niacinamide and green tea to further support the barrier function. It is designed to draw in and retain moisture while moisturizing without feeling heavy or sticky. It's slightly challenging to describe as it delivers a comfortable matte texture at the same time skin feels supple, hydrated and moisturized. The whole line is suitable for all skin types although oily to combo skin types would enjoy this particular 3 step regime.
**This review was created through an educational promotional event hosted between the brand and beauty experts.**
faceoff_positive.headline: BYOMA Moisturizing Gel Cream

faceoff_negative.comments:
I'm a licensed cosmetologist, my passion is hair. But sometimes I love trying new beauty items for myself and for my clients that ask for recommendations. I wanted to try BYOMA Moisturizing Gel Cream.  The benefits of this cream to protect and restore back the barrier of the skin.   Scent: there is no fragrance, so perfect for sensitive skin and ones with sensitive to smells.  Texture: gel like and feels kind of creamy.  It's not too heavy after applying. My skin: is combination. So it's ideally for all skin types.    This cream does hydrate the skin but after awhile your skin starts to feel dry. I didn't noticed how long it took for my skin to feel "thirsty". To put it this way the cream is like drinking water for the skin. You need to keep applying to feel like your skin is hydrated and smooth. The benefits of this cream is to protect and restore the skins barrier, so I'm not sure the "thirsty" skin I'm feeling is part of the process.   BYOMA is easy to find at target and it's not expensive.  Overall, I would recommend this to my clients but with fair warning of the aftermath on how the skin feels. It's a 50/50 feeling towards this product. I love the benefits but I don't love the fact that I feel I need to keep applying to make my skin happy. 
**This review was created through an educational promotional event hosted between the brand and beauty experts.**
